home.title: DocumentoIQ | AI to extract information and analyze complex documents
home.description: Analyze, extract and organize key information from extensive documents in minutes, reducing review time by up to 70% and human errors by up to 80%, without replacing your professional judgment.

pricing.title: Plans and Pricing | DocumentoIQ - From Free to Enterprise
